weight: Approx.765 g with battery and memory card
lenstype: Compatible with AF NIKKOR lenses,AI-P NIKKOR lenses, and non-CPU lenses
selftimer: 2 s, 5 s, 10 s, 20 s; 1 - 9 exposures at intervals of 0.5, 1, 2, or 3 s
autofocus: Nikon Multi-CAM 4800 autofocus sensor with TTL phase detection
continuousshots: 1 - 5 fps (continuous low speed) or 5.5 fps (continuous high speed)
numberoffocuspoints: Can be selected from 39 or 11 focus points
others: approx.170 ° viewing angle, approx.100% frame coverage, and brightness control
modes: Front-curtain sync, slow sync, rear-curtain sync, red-eye reduction, red-eye reduction with slow sync, slow rear-curtain sync, Auto FP High-Speed Sync supported
